title: Functional messenger RNA with 5 answer options

content.question: Which of the following normally leads to the production of functional messenger RNA in eukaryotic cells?

choices.label: A decrease in the rate of ribosome synthesis
The removal of portions of RNA known as intervening sequences (introns)
A decrease in RNA polymerase activity
The replication of new messenger RNA molecules from existing messenger RNA molecules
The formation of peptide bonds between adjacent nucleotides

content.answer: The removal of portions of RNA known as intervening sequences (introns)
